typography.installation: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600&family=Manrope:wght@400;600;700;800&family=JetBrains+Mono&display=swap');

colors.description: Deep obsidian backgrounds, high-contrast white text, and subtle surface elevations. Color is used only for action and status.

layout.spacing_system: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards. p-12 for section gaps.

grid_system.dashboard: Mode B: High Density. grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4. gap-4.
grid_system.gallery: Mode A: Tetris Grid. Mix of col-span-1 and col-span-2 for visual interest.
grid_system.mobile: Single column. Full width cards. Bottom sheet navigation.

border_radius.button: rounded-full (9999px) for primary actions, rounded-md for tools

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-white/90 shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(255,255,255,0.1)] transition-all duration-300

inputs.style: bg-input/50 border-white/10 focus:border-white/30 focus:ring-0 rounded-md h-11

navigation.sidebar: bg-background border-r border-white/5 w-64 hidden md:flex flex-col
navigation.mobile_nav: fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-xl border-t border-white/10 h-16 flex items-center justify-around z-50

visual_enhancers.gradients: Use subtle radial gradients (radial-gradient(circle at center, var(--tw-gradient-stops))) for hero backgrounds. NO linear gradients on buttons.
visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-2xl for modals. shadow-none for internal dashboard cards.

assets.icons: Use lucide-react. Stroke width: 1.5px for elegance.

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }}

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use gradients for text or buttons. Keep it flat and clean.
DO NOT use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Manrope'.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (WCAG AA).
All interactive elements MUST have data-testid attributes.
Mobile-first design for the Customer facing pages.
Dense, data-rich design for the Admin Dashboard.
Dark mode is the DEFAULT and ONLY mode.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Update tailwind.config.js with the colors provided. 2. Update index.css with the CSS variables. 3. Install 'framer-motion' and 'sonner'. 4. Create the layout components (Sidebar, MobileNav). 5. Build the pages following the 'Netflix/Spotify' aesthetic (dark, immersive, content-first).
